description: Negative interest rates pose a significant challenge for central banks, necessitating effective strategies and policies to mitigate their adverse effects on the economy. Negative interest rates represent an unconventional economic condition where nominal interest rates fall below zero. Instead of earning interest on their deposits, depositors pay the bank to hold their money. This traditional […]
title: Opinion| Impact of negative interest rates on economy, citizens

description: The rapid digital transformation sweeping the Middle East presents both opportunities and challenges for businesses integrating artificial intelligence (AI) technologies. While advancements in generative AI models, such as ChatGPT, offer significant benefits, ethical considerations and potential risks require careful attention. A key concern lies in the inherent biases present in AI training data. These biases […]
title: Middle Eastern businesses face growing challenges in ethical AI integration

description: Egypt’s Minister of the Public Enterprise Sector Mohamed Shimi visited Nasr Automotive Company (NAC) on Saturday, in a move underlining the government’s commitment to revitalising Egypt’s automotive sector. The visit comes as NAC embarks on a strategic plan to modernise operations, expand its market reach, and attract investment. Minister Shimi toured NAC’s facilities, inspecting ongoing […]
title: Egyptian Minister visits Nasr Automotive, signalling government support for industry revival

description: The Egyptian Ministry of Culture will present a diverse program of over 100 artistic events at the second edition of the New Alamein Festival, running from July 14 to August 28. title: Ministry of Culture to showcase Egyptian heritage at New Alamein Festival

description: On Friday, 12 July, star singer Hakim performed at a grand event at Luxury Beach, the first Beach Club in the Delta region, as part of the exclusive events organized by Delta Capital for Urban Development for its clients. description: The House of Representatives’ Special Committee tasked with reviewing the government’s program has concluded several days of intensive meetings. title: House Committee nears completion of Egyptian government program review

description: American pop star Jason Derulo, currently on tour in Egypt, visited the Giza Pyramids Complex, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World. title: Jason Derulo visits Giza Pyramids during Egyptian tour

description: Egypt’s Minister of Planning and International Cooperation, Rania Al-Mashat, signed three memoranda of understanding (MoUs) with Chinese officials during her visit to Beijing for the second Conference of the Forum on Global Action for Shared Development. These agreements aim to strengthen cooperation across various sectors and reflect a growing partnership between the two countries. The […]
title: Egypt, China deepen ties: Al-Mashat signs 3 MoUs on development cooperation

description: Egypt’s Minister of Environment, Yasmine Fouad, met with Mohamed El-Zamlout, Governor of the New Valley Governorate, on Saturday to explore investment opportunities in managing agricultural waste, particularly palm fronds. title: Environment Minister, New Valley Governor discuss investment in palm frond waste
